subject: The Colony Shoreline Trail 5K and 15K Registration Confirmation
body:
[1]The Colony Shoreline Trail 5K and 15K

Registration Confirmation

The Colony Shoreline Trail 5K and 15K
Race Date Saturday October 21, 2023
Race Location The Colony, TX 75056 US
Contact Email stephenjhidalgo@gmail.com

Total: $44.25

This charge may show on your credit card descriptor as SignUp *TheColonyShorelin or RunSignup.

Place

3700 Sparks Road
The Colony, TX 75056 US

Description

Registration for The Colony Shoreline Trail 15K and Green Dragon 5K, previously known as The Colony Half Marathon and Green Dragon Five Miler, is now open. Join us this year to run through the beautiful Shoreline Trail and Ridgepointe neighborhood in The Colony, Texas, at 8:00 a.m. on Saturday, October 21, 2023. It’s a flat course, great scenery, even better weather, free post-run beer and did we mention that quarter zips are back? Proceeds benefit Angels Fall Up to support cancer research. About 85 percent of this race will take place on The Colony's Shoreline Trail, a 3.5-mile out and back crushed granite trail that overlooks the beautiful Lake Lewisville.

Race Contact Info

If you have any questions about this Race, please contact the race director at stephenjhidalgo@gmail.com

subject: TC Shoreline Run: Race Week is Here!
body:
[1]The Colony Shoreline Trail 5K and 15K


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      [2]Sign Up


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        image


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       [3]The Colony Shoreline Trail 5K and 15K



                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Saturday, October 21, 2023


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Start Time: 8:00 a.m. for both the 15K and 5K
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Location: 3700 Sparks Road, The Colony, Texas, 75056


The Colony Shoreline 15K and Green Dragon 5K is almost here! Here are some race day reminders/information you might find helpful.
Packet Pickup
Packet Pickup will be at The Colony Recreation Center (5151 North Colony Boulevard, The Colony, Texas, 75056) in The Colony from 12:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m. on Friday, October 20. Packet pickup will also be available on race day starting at 6:30 a.m. until right before the race starts. Get there early as lines form!
Hotels
If you're traveling for our race, we highly recommend staying at one of three hotels in The Cascades, located just a few miles from the race site. Choose from Residence Inn, Courtyard or Fairfield Inn, all by Marriott.
Race Day Swag
Quarter zips are back! The last day to be guaranteed a quarter zip was October 7. If you registered after October 7, we do not guarantee a quarter zip and you are running a "No Frills" race. Please do not get upset at our volunteers for missing the cutoff. This is a charity event and everyone planning our race is a volunteer.
Transfers/Refunds
We do not offer refunds for the race, as stated in the waiver you signed when registering. We can transfer you to a different race. To transfer, please email Stephen Hidalgo at [4]stephenjhidalgo@gmail.com no later than Thursday, October 19. Any transfer requests sent after 11:59 p.m. on October 19 will need to be handled on the morning of the race.
Race Day Parking
You will be able to park inside Stewart Creek park, but please note, if you do, you will not be able to leave until about 10:00 or 10:30 a.m. If you are running the 5K and want to leave early, you can park at the grass field located at Pecan Crossing and North Colony just before entering the park. There will be volunteers and signs to guide you.
Start Time
Both the 5K and 15K will start promptly at 8:00 a.m.
Miscellaneous
Strollers, headphones and dogs are okay. If you bring a dog to run, please ensure they are properly hydrated and prepared to run our course. If you are running with a stroller or dog, please be courteous and start in the back of the pack since this is a chip-timed event.
Follow us on Facebook for the most up to date information, and see you on October 21!
Race Map

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                [6]Go to Race Website

   2. https://runsignup.com/Race/Register/?raceId=146811&rsus=100-200-0e6b4333-7c9e-4c0f-8fec-ff86c1f65060

subject: A Message From The Colony Shoreline Run
body:
[1]The Colony Shoreline Trail 5K and 15K


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      [2]Sign Up


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        image


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          [3]The Colony Shoreline 5K and 15K



                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Thank Your for Making The Colony Shoreline Run a Success!


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             Photos available for purchase and race results are available


Dear TC Shoreline Runners,
We want to express our heartfelt gratitude for your participation in the inaugural The Colony Shoreline Run. Your enthusiasm and dedication made the event a tremendous success. The perfect weather that graced us on race day was only matched by the warmth of your spirits and the energy you brought to the event.
We are thrilled to announce that, thanks to your support, we were able to raise a significant amount of donations for [4]Angels Fall Up, an organization committed to researching and finding a cure for cancer through UT Southwestern. Your contribution will make a meaningful difference in the lives of those who are fighting cancer. Your commitment to both the run and our charity cause is truly commendable, and we couldn't have achieved this without your presence.
This event is and always has been a 100-percent volunteer-led race. Not one single person who organizes our race is paid for their efforts. We all have families, full-time jobs and other responsibilities, and we are all passionate about providing a superb grass-root, local event for the Dallas/Fort Worth Metroplex.
Photos are now available for purchase through Photographer Gray Kinney of My Finisher Photos. [5]Click here to browse all event photos. Additionally, you can view your race results [6]here.
Thank you again for your support, and happy training for your next race!
Best wishes,
The Colony Shoreline Run Race Team
Stephen Hidalgo, Race Director
Michael Hundt, Assistant Race Director
Karen Wise, Volunteer Director


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     CONTACT RACE

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  [7]Email This Race

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    [8]Contact Us!


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    [9]Unsubscribe

subject: New Message about Laura & Sean's Baby Shower
body:
Event Canceled


Laura & Sean'S Baby Shower

"To Our Dearest Family and Friends, 

We hope you are all doing well during this difficult time.

In consideration of the CDC’s recommendations regarding social gatherings, we have decided to cancel our upcoming Baby Shower. This decision deeply saddens us as we were very excited to celebrate with you all. However, our priority is the health and safety of our family, friends, and loved ones.

Thank you all for your love and support.

Love you all,

Golafshan Family"

subject: Robert & Ellie Price sent you a new message.
body:
Please join us for a fun-filled day celebrating Kaia turning 5!
The event will be held on the Arbor Lawn, located on the back right side of the clubhouse. Self-parking is available in the Country Club parking lot.
Siblings are welcome; please let me know if they are joining.
Please RSVP by Sunday, September 4, 2022
We are looking forward to seeing you all and celebrating!
Robert & Ellie Price sent you a message.
View message
 
 
Kaia Nour's 5th Birthday Celebration
Sunday, September 18th from 12pm to 3pm PDT
Aliso Viejo Country Club
33 Santa Barbara Dr
Aliso Viejo, CA 92656
For the best Paperless Post experience, please add paperlesspost@paperlesspost.com to your address book; this will guarantee that you receive all invitations and cards in your email inbox. > با درود، پیش از هر چیز اجازه میخواهیم از همه شما برای حمایت بی دریغتان در جهت تلاش برای آزادی ایران سپاسگزاری کنیم. متاسفانه به دلیل نزدیکی تظاهرات ۲۲ بهمن و نیاز به افراد برای سازماندهی این حرکت، برنامه جمعه شب ۲ فوریه برگزار نخواهد شد. از همه شما یاران برای دعوت نمودن دوستان خود در این برنامه سپاسگزاریم و از این تغییر ناگهانی پوزش میخواهیم. اعلام میکنیم که همه ما و به امید همکاری و همیاری شما هم میهنان آماده هستیم که با تمام توانمان در تظاهرات ۲۲ بهمن، ۱۱ فوریه شرکت کنیم. مکان و تاریخ این گردهمایی با شکوه به زودی به اطلاع یارانمان خواهد رسید. به امید آزادی ایران.   کمیته حمایت از تظاهرات داخل کشور

subject: Re: final copy
body:
Attached are the final versions.

On Mon, May 13, 2019 at 1:29 PM Hengameh pishrow <hengameh_p_amin@yahoo.com>
wrote:

> Hengameh P. Amin
>
> Professor Oswalt
>
> English 1302
>
> May 2019
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>                                                                      The
> Wall Around Heaven
>
>
>
>             The 2016 presidential election may have been one of the most
> controversial elections in
>
> the US history. President Trump's slogan of "Making America Great Again"
> included many
>
> different ideas of how we can have a great nation. One of the biggest
> issues addressed by
>
> president Trump's campaign had been on building a wall on the US/Mexico
> border. After 9/11
>
> terrorist attacks on the US soil, immigration has become a very sensitive
> subject. Border security
>
> seems even more essential than ever before in the history of the United
> States. Even though
>
> building this wall might help minimizing the entrance of the illegal
> immigrants, it does not seem
>
> like a practical solution due to engineering challenges, the environmental
> and geographical
>
> hurdles, and ethical issues that it faces. While protecting the US borders
> is essential, building
>
> such a wall at the US/Mexico border is not a viable solution.
>
>
>
> Engineering challenges is one of the biggest millstones for building this
> wall on the
>
> US/Mexico border. Some engineers note the project would run up against a
> variety of problems,
>
> including, the estimate high cost of about fifty million dollars, the
> problems in choosing the
>
> material, and the actual difficulty of building this structure. In order
> to keep people from being able
>
> to climb up the wall or dig under the wall, this wall needs to be at least
> 18 feet tall and sunk at least 6
>
> feet under the ground. It needs to include at least 25 to 50 feet gates to
> allow passage for vehicles and
>
> pedestrians to go through.  Much of the border is hundreds of miles from
> the nearest big city, Building
>
> Page 1
>
> new walls would require constructing roads to get there first.  The
> production of cement, surveying the
>
> land, land acquisition, and building access roads are just a few problems
> we are facing. Not to forget
>
> about the cost of the constant maintenance requirement ,the number of
> workers needed for this
>
> project and providing transport and medical care for them.
>
>
>
> The second problem with the US/ Mexico border wall is the environmental
> and
>
> geographical hurdles. President Trump says he wants the USA to build a
> wall along half the
>
> 2,000-mile border. This is not an easy matter since in some area building
> a wall is impossible
>
> due to the fact that this route is cuts across rivers, mountains, and land
> owned by Native
>
> American tribes and private citizens. It requires mass voluntary sell of
> private owned lands or
>
> getting a right of the way to these lands for building this wall. This
> route also is home to a lot of
>
> wildlife which building this wall will cut off the flow of water for them.

subject: final copy
body:
Hengameh P. Amin

Professor Oswalt

English 1302

May 2019

 

 

 

                                                                    The Wall Around Heaven

 

            The 2016 presidential election mayhave been one of the most controversial elections in 

the US history. President Trump's slogan of"Making America Great Again" included many 

different ideas of how we can have a great nation. Oneof the biggest issues addressed by 

president Trump's campaign had been on building a wallon the US/Mexico border. After 9/11 

terrorist attacks on the US soil, immigration hasbecome a very sensitive subject. Border security 

seems even more essential than ever before in thehistory of the United States. Even though 

building this wall might help minimizing the entranceof the illegal immigrants, it does not seem 

like a practical solution due to engineering challenges,the environmental and geographical 

hurdles, and ethical issues that it faces. Whileprotecting the US borders is essential, building 

such a wall at the US/Mexico border is not a viablesolution.

            

Engineering challenges isone of the biggest millstones for building this wall on the 

US/Mexico border. Some engineers note the projectwould run up against a variety of problems, 

including, the estimate high cost of about fiftymillion dollars, the problems in choosing the 

material, and the actual difficulty of building thisstructure. In order to keep people from being able 

to climb up the wall or dig under the wall, this wall needsto be at least 18 feet tall and sunk at least 6 

feet under the ground. It needs to include at least 25 to 50feet gates to allow passage for vehicles and 

pedestrians to go through.  Much of the border is hundreds of miles fromthe nearest big city, Building 

Page 1

new walls would require constructing roads to get therefirst.  The production of cement, surveyingthe 

land, land acquisition, and building access roads are just afew problems we are facing. Not to forget 

about the cost of the constant maintenance requirement ,thenumber of workers needed for this 

project and providing transport and medical care for them.

 

The second problem withthe US/ Mexico border wall is the environmental and 

geographical hurdles. President Trump says he wants theUSA to build a wall along half the 

2,000-mile border. This is not an easy matter since insome area building a wall is impossible 

due to the fact that this route is cuts across rivers,mountains, and land owned by Native 

American tribes and private citizens. It requires massvoluntary sell of private owned lands or 

getting a right of the way to these lands for buildingthis wall. This route also is home to a lot of 

wildlife which building this wall will cut off theflow of water for them. This wall can be an 

environmental disaster. As stated in an articlewritten by XXXXX , The Institute for Sustainable 

Energy and the Environment at University of Bathestimates that 7.8 million metric tons of 

carbon dioxide will be emitted from concrete alone:the same volume of emissions released by 

823,654 occupied homes over the course of a year. Thewall will also cross habitats used by 

many endangered species,  birds, and fish hatcheries, and a number ofprotected wetlands, 

according to a U.S. Fish and Wildlife Report. Environmentalistssay with building this wall there 

is potential ecological damage, and higherflash-flooding risk.  The climate impactsof a massive 

concrete wall begin with the source of the materials.

 

Another issue withbuilding a wall at the US/ Mexico border is the ethical issues. In one 

statement president trump has called Mexicanimmigrants criminals, rapists, and drug dealers. To 

my surprise, His remarks and statements were cheeredfor and supported by many of his 

followers. His slogan of “Making America Great Again”was questionable to me, thinking how 

someone who is demoting other humans based on theirnationality can ever make anything great. 

Didn’t our founding father Thomas Jefferson clearlyannounced in the declaration of 

Page2

 

independence that all men are created equal? That theyendowed by their creator with certain 

unalienable rights, that among these are life, liberty,and pursuit of happiness? Who are 

Americans? Aren’t they Europeans immigrated to theland of Native Indians in search of better 

life, liberty, and happiness? Why it was great for Europeansto migrate to this country over two 

hundred years ago and the same concept is so wrongnowadays?  Have we ever though why 

some people put their lives in great danger, and gothrough so much just to try to come to this 

great land? Many of these people have potential forbeing a great asset to this country. They are 

just escaping war, injustice, or depressing governments.Look at the number of doctors, lawyers, 

engineers, university professors, and many other welleducated professionals who migrated to 

this country and contributed so much to make theunited states a great country. Let us be fair and 

give anybody who can contribute to this country tohave a fair chance to do so.

 

In conclusion, engineeringchallenges, the environmental and geographical hurdles, and 

ethical issues are only few reasons the proposed wallat the US/Mexico border suggested by 

president Trump is not a viable solution. I am notsuggesting having open borders. As one priest 

in support of president trump said even heaven haswalls around it, but we already have secure 

fences and secure borders. Going so much further tobuild this wall is completely not justified.  

Even though building this wall might help minimizingthe entrance of the illegal immigrants, It 

does not justify the cost and burden it puts onAmericans. Also let us not forget, it is evident 

most terrorist attacks on the US soil have beencommitted by terrorists entering the US legally 

and not by illegal immigrants. Let us remember thefour pillars of this heavenly land as 

suggested by our founding fathers are  justice, life, liberty, and pursuit ofhappiness for 

everybody without considering their race, color ornational origin.

subject: Fw: Compensation Review - Hannah
body:
Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone


Begin forwarded message:

On Monday, December 5, 2022, 1:24 PM, Srini <sreen22@gmail.com> wrote:


Hi Hannah,
Good Morning, sorry for the late reply. Hope everything is going well with you specially after the car accident. We appreciate all your hard work and dedication.  
Our objective is to help you with your work load, based on your recommendation we hired new front desk resource. 
Lately, the practice expenses have increased tremendously and in top of it the unexpected breakdown of pano has added more expenses to the list.
I think option 1 will be favorable for you however we would prefer you to work 2 Monday's in a month not just on a need basis as such we are open only 1 Saturday per month.
With regards to option 2, the bonus starts at 50k, however with this option there will be more management of hours and honestly Option 1 is much better to consider.
This will be effective from January 2023.
Thank you,Srini


On Sat, Dec 3, 2022, 9:52 AM Hengameh pishrow <hengameh_p_amin@yahoo.com> wrote:


Good morning, Just following up on the last email. 

Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone


On Saturday, November 12, 2022, 2:32 PM, Hengameh pishrow <hengameh_p_amin@yahoo.com> wrote:

 Hi Srini,
I apologize for the delayed response, it has been a hectic past couple of months for me. Thank you for your consideration. Compensation is not always an easy conversation to have, so I greatly appreciate your time and effort toward this.
These are very generous options. To keep things simple, I will focus on the details of the two options provided. I am not opposed to either option. I do have some comments and questions which I have provided below.
Option 1: The $427 monthly base salary increase and 1 week of PTO work great. Would you be against me committing 1 extra day a month (Monday, Saturday, or Sunday) and additional days as needed to meet collections deadlines? (In lieu of 2 Mondays a month 9AM-5PM)
Option 2:The $30/hr hourly plan and 1 week PTO also work great. Could you clarify what the bonus plan would look like for this option?
Thank you again! I am more than happy to continue this conversation in person or over the phone. Looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
Best regards,Hannah    On Friday, October 7, 2022 at 09:00:26 AM CDT, Office Manager <office@newsmilesfrisco.com> wrote:  
 
 

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Srini <sreen22@gmail.com>
Date: Thu, Oct 6, 2022 at 5:26 PM
Subject: Compensation Review - Hannah
To: office <office@newsmilesfrisco.com>
Cc: Manju Alapati <dralapati@newsmilesfrisco.com>


Hi Hannah,
Hope all is well, We discussed your remuneration package, First of all we want to thank you for all your hard work and dedication and appreciate your efforts. During the last few years the practice number has increased and thank you for all the team work. As you know very well when practice production increases the variable expenses also increase at the same rate. We have been very fair with you and all along have done what is best for you, we committed to our agreement to keep your bonus structure as is irrespective of increase in overheads.  You are the only staff member who is very well compensated with a generous bonus every month ever since you have joined and with a generous Christmas gift  which is equal to almost 4 days pay.
I also want to bring to your attention that we have reduced  the practice hours this year from 29 hours weekly and 12 hrs for 2 Saturdays a month to 28 hours weekly and 6 hrs, one  Saturday a month However, your base salary was not changed, I hope you realized and understood. 
We have taken into consideration in the past for personal time off on a need basis and did not reduce your salary either, because we all along treated you like an extended family. 

Below is breakdown of your YTD salary2021 - 71,436 - 2022 - 62,827 as of Sep 27. With 3 months ahead of us in 2022, you will be close to 80k or even more. 
It looks like you have a question on your bi-weekly paycheck, the reason for the difference is we agree to pay $93 towards your health insurance hence there is a difference in your second paycheck.
I have also checked with CPA regarding your compensation. He said for  large million dollar practices, office manager salary tops off at 70K -75k, and the rest of the offices average salary total compensation is 50K - 55K. Industry average nationwide is 50-60K you can google yourself. The CPA handles 30+ offices across all of Texas. So, his feedback is very valuable for us when it comes to financial decisions. So, we are very fair and reasonable with respect to compensation. On a side note, your compensation also equates to close to 10% of office collection, which is very high by any standards.
Your current average hourly salary is $26.76($1773.00 + 1680 = $3453. Our office working hours are 28 hrs. per week and 6 or 12 extra hrs a month for 2 Saturdays on *4 weeks per month). which comes to 124 hrs if its 2 saturdays and add 4 or 5 more grace  hrs with total of 129hrs a month
Based on the review we have below two options.
Option 1:We can increase your monthly base salary at the best by $427 which is $5,124 increase in yearly income provided you work 2 Mondays a month 9 AM - 5PM and not half days and 1 Week of Paid Time Off (PTO)
Option 2:We will pay an hourly rate of $30.00 for 35 Hours every week, which will equate to $4200 per month. Bonus will start at 40k  Collection  and 1 week PTO


Thank you,Srini
Srinivas R Vangala



-- 
HannahOffice ManagerNew Smiles Dental Excellence FriscoGeneral & Cosmetic Dentistry including InvisalignOffice : 469-458-2035Fax:     469-458-2036Web: www.NewSmilesFrisco.comTo Schedule an Appointment - Visit our web site

The information contained in this email message and any attachments is confidential and intended only for the addressee(s). If you are not an addressee, you may not copy or disclose the information, or act upon it, and you should delete it entirely from your email system. Please notify the sender that you received this email in error.

Important information
You don’t need to print anything, you only need to show your Fever
ticket(s) at the venue.

Ticket(s) can only be validated with the staff of the venue. Once
validated, ticket(s) cannot be reused.

During the concert, you must remain seated and maintain silence, apart from
applause during pieces, so that others can enjoy the music. Food and drink
will not be available as eating and drinking are not permitted (you may
bring bottled water if required).

Please arrive at least 30 minutes before the start time as late admission
cannot be allowed under any circumstance. No refunds are allowed. Exchanges
to other dates and/or times are permitted up to 48 hours before the start
time of the originally purchased event and is based on availability.

I have office hours at 1030AM, so I would need to take you at like 915AM. I
can pick you up Sunday at 10AM😊

Shaw

> at 11:00am (for our 12:40pm flight) and/or picking us up at around 10am on
> sunday when we arrive? Chinonso will stay with me on thursday night or we
> can stay at your house to make it easier.
>
> thank yew,
>
>

body:
would he be against dropping her and chinnu off to the airport on friday at
11:00am (for our 12:40pm flight) and/or picking us up at around 10am on
sunday when we arrive? Chinonso will stay with me on thursday night or we
can stay at your house to make it easier.

thank yew,

to learn more about offsetting your carbon footprint.

*Terms & Conditions*

This ticket is non-refundable unless the original ticket was issued at a
fully refundable fare. Some fares may not allow changes. If allowed, any
change to your itinerary may require payment of a change fee and increased
fare. Failure to appear for any flight without notice to Delta will result
in cancellation of your remaining reservation.

Note: When using certain vouchers to purchase tickets, remaining credits
may not be refunded. Additional charges and/or credits may apply.

†All SkyMiles® program rules apply. To review the rules, see Membership
Guide & Program Rules. Taxes and fees for Award Travel are the
responsibility of the passenger and must be paid at the time the ticket is
booked. Award Travel seats are limited and may not be available on all
flights or in all markets. Offers void where prohibited by law. Other
restrictions may apply.

*Checked Bag Allowance*

*On Delta® operated flights, you may carry on one bag and a small personal
item at no charge.

Delta One®/First/Business Class weight allowance reverts to 50 lbs for all
checked bags beyond regular free allowance.

At the time of check in with Delta, SkyMiles Medallion members, SkyTeam
Elite & Elite Plus and active US Military personnel are eligible for fee
waivers and other benefits. For more details, visit delta.com/baggage
<https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201ff189a1c3686eb981015622fcbf3d273d74a8520fcf16dbe8c6087a99fc33f3cca0f55f8cfdc7914cebd5e35162c326f1fc1dee9dac8a15502b0524d51079b8f3>.
Basic Cardmembers with a Gold, Platinum, or Reserve Delta SkyMiles Credit
Card from American Express are eligible for the first bag fee waiver. More
details on the program can be found at delta.com/firstbagfree
<https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201f76c337f2520bdb277c4e3f1ecab3b5d1e5f0267528f47d00e08a675725c8399c28b18f3d172a5f109724605c30bb4b275701b7dffdae2f6f2c3e5ab0a4eb3f07>

A standard checked bag with Delta may be up to 50 lbs and 62 linear inches
(per piece). Additional fees apply for oversize, overweight, and/or
additional pieces of checked baggage. Please review Delta's baggage
guidelines for details. Weight and size restrictions may vary when checking
baggage on carriers other than Delta. Contact with the operating carrier
for detailed checked baggage allowances. You must be checked in at the gate
by the applicable check-in deadlines or your reservation may be cancelled.
Please review Delta's check-in requirement guidelines for details. Check-in
requirements vary by airline, so if your ticket includes travel on other
airlines, please check with the operating carrier on your ticket.

Do you have comments about our service? Please email
<https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201faed7e24680ded910be28ee0d19d883a046971dfb2a624d428bc101d3d610a01a0ea6ca4d75392fe7423c70faacc0c028da13a47ec394c1bc>us
to share them.

*ADVICE TO INTERNATIONAL PASSENGERS ON LIMITATIONS OF LIABILITY*

Passengers embarking upon a journey involving an ultimate destination or a
stop in a country other than the country of departure are advised that the
provisions of an international treaty (the Warsaw Convention, the 1999
Montreal Convention, or other treaty), as well as a carrier’s own contract
of carriage or tariff provisions, may be applicable to their entire
journey, including any portion entirely within the countries of departure
and destination. The applicable treaty governs and may limit the liability
of carriers to passengers for death or personal injury, destruction or loss
of, or damage to, baggage, and for delay of passengers and baggage.

Additional protection can usually be obtained by purchasing insurance from
a private company. Such insurance is not affected by any limitation of the
carrier’s liability under an international treaty. For further information
please consult your airline or insurance company representative.

*Conditions of Carriage*

Air transportation on Delta and the Delta Connection® carriers is subject
to Delta's conditions of carriage
<https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201fd6a76214753109f539989da56fbff007bfdeb40548f3cda2012de98bda53064f447a66cc20a374bd12c66fcfa60548c7272749442de9a11c>.
They include terms governing for example:

• Limits on our liability
<https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201f7dc551f474d1902e672b568b81f49f2e019230bfb0334455df69149d72434a999edb9521bc5b13efb1428a173c0a6466d1fff3c36080464e32a97dce9f2f9f87>
for personal injury or death of passengers, and for loss, damage of delay
of goods and baggage.
• Claim restrictions
<https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201f57290fedea1dbf6f533e41c3b1a5fed551577b48fd3a29f8199f1a0a0f228f9dc11a759db366af11df820cdd29624b9cc973454e8747819ad766e9910c39d0ea>
including time periods within which you must file a claim or bring action
against us.
• Our right to change terms
<https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201ffcf518f1b4a7f238cb8e921161be91721ef97dc34efb3f3344474ff5de25d2a85381368b016fb356a50ab9f1e1faaf53bb5d61314e9201aa4bac3479ad68dcbc>
of the contract.
• Check-in requirements
<https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201f6453abd55f42946b76a662619292446c6f38ca166fa3420e7c241189b411efab04e63d6662ffe319d307844794a8936a765e2867ec0de3ff41c588601e4b84f5>
and other rules established when we may refuse carriage
<https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201f1ff3c428e03ca4337a307619a7cb19e3dcb77f93cbd9ad4826a471c43b50da2839dcdf1e8b1aad5bf6385a3f2ab7c111f17911aec0cfd60a5c709f6c6d1ed686>
.
• Our rights and limits of our liability for delay or failure to perform
service
<https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201fa006740bcadf2e59b1b4bacab203e9eaa9ab59e3e2278b439f462fb3bba0da9a106d71ef156d7bb6f1133932e450bbbe2dc3d14ebfcd257d576c746bd5bb8c1f>
including schedule change, substitution of alternative air carriers or
aircraft, and rerouting.
• Our policy on overbooking flights
<https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201ff9161306644b57279ed1f13dc1b7016ddcbf8c6afe79e8d633154f7f87278c7bf4e8c5b250801055fee52c9b388285fe58d9c326474808adca703bd3826a746f>,
and your rights if we deny you boarding due to an oversold flight.

These terms are incorporated by reference into our contract with you. You
may view these conditions of carriage on delta.com, or by requesting a copy
from Delta.

You have received this email because you elected to receive your Electronic
Ticket receipt sent to you via email. If you would like to take advantage
of other Delta email programs featuring special fares, promotions,
information and flight updates, please visit: delta.com/emailprograms
<https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201f3907dd0311a700510dd72f337d347b7cb786543e559d033c919bbae99b9f80ffbb042ab3b00d6af30b0311e00dbe3c1a876a31b8f19e2e263dfe0f404dfaac0d>
or delta.com/notifications
<https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201fec88902376bc1c47c24442478a34e35ee5a09df545039d625d61d70c4edcbacc5dea531ba9ddf246707d672f60a99ff071eb3cee2322ad40d003245e2bb61cc0>

This document establishes the creation of your electronic EMD(S) in our
computer systems. It does not constitute a document of carriage. Where this
document is issued for transportation or services other than passenger air
transportation, specific terms and conditions may apply. These terms and
conditions may be provided separately or may be obtained from the issuing
agent.

Effective December 15, 2019, the Canada Air Passenger Protection
Regulations may provide additional protections to passengers traveling to
or from Canada:



*If you are denied boarding, your flight is cancelled or delayed for at
least two hours, or your baggage is lost or damaged, you may be entitled to
certain standards of treatment and compensation under the Air Passenger
Protection Regulations. For more information about your passenger rights
please contact your air carrier (www.delta.com/appr
<https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201f649fb8b1ffec097cefb820ef2adc695c8a2d5417ecbdd7bb08a04745a65e9211e4890cc4fd39903d3c9f25ea2585de95c18b9b83c15ba45e18a9160ecb411a32>)
or visit the Canadian Transportation Agency’s website. Si l’embarquement
vous est refusé, ou si votre vol est annulé ou retardé d’au moins deux
heures ou si vos bagages sont perdus ou endommagés, vous pourriez avoir
droit au titre du Règlement sur la protection des passagers aériens, à
certains avantages au titre des normes de traitement applicables et à une
indemnité. Pour de plus amples renseignements sur vos droits, veuillez
communiquer avec votre transporteur aérien ( www.delta.com/appr
<https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201f073782b624b0c1b77f9f157f44ac850983091edc3b6a3458b8765c11b955126655d3758ba54093f98aa63b610efa95f61563869fcb6cc8099410527824d0a24d>)
ou visiter le site Web de l’Office des transports du Canada.*

*COPYRIGHT INFORMATION*

This email message and its contents are copyrighted and are proprietary

This is a post only email (EMD+). Please do not respond to this message.

*PRIVACY POLICY*

> We have a 10 minute grace period. Please call us if you are running later

subject: Re: Your Flight Receipt - IFEOMA AHUNA 12NOV21
body:
I can do that. Could you send me a calendar invite for your flights?

Sent from my iPhone 


> On Nov 1, 2021, at 9:40 PM, Ifeoma Ahuna <ifyahuna@gmail.com> wrote:
> 
> ﻿
> Just making sure this weekend you can still drop us off and pick chinonso up (?) I will stay at the airport cause i'll fly to Orlando for Terawatt but Chinnu will need a ride to my place on Sunday Nov. 14th after 9:46am.
> 
> Lemme know!
> 
>> On Fri, Sep 24, 2021 at 9:23 PM Chinonso Ahuna <chinonsoahuna@yahoo.com> wrote:
>> 
>> 
>> Sent from my iPhone
>> 
>> Begin forwarded message:
>> 
>>> From: Delta Air Lines <DeltaAirLines@t.delta.com>
>>> Date: September 24, 2021 at 9:22:21 PM CDT
>>> To: chinonsoahuna@yahoo.com
>>> Subject: Your Flight Receipt - IFEOMA AHUNA 12NOV21
>>> Reply-To: Transactional Email Reply Inbox <reply-186081-14_HTML-9953984-10982494-431796@t.delta.com>
>>> 
>>> ﻿
>>>  	
>>> 
>>> Hello, Ifeoma Ahuna
>>> Confirmation #: JN6X8O
>>> 
>>> You're all set. If your plans change, be sure to make changes or cancel via MyTrips on delta.com before your flight departs to maintain the value of your ticket. 
>>> 
>>> WE'VE GOT YOU COVERED
>>> With the Delta CareStandardSM, we’re partnering with trusted health experts to raise the standard for safer travel and offering added flexibility to change your plans with ease.
>>> YOUR PRE-TRIP CHECKLIST FOR EASIER TRAVEL:
>>> 
>>> JOIN SKYMILES® - start earning miles that don't expire and can take you to more than 1,000 destinations. In addition, receive important information about your trip whenever you fly. Join today for free ›
>>> 
>>> DOWNLOAD THE FLY DELTA APP – With real-time push notifications sent to your mobile device, you’ll never miss an update. With the Fly Delta app, you can easily track your checked bags, check your flight status under the "My Trips" tab, access your digital boarding pass, message Delta and more. Download Now ›
>>> 
>>> VISIT OUR HELP CENTER PAGE – get all your travel questions answered with information on self-service tools, baggage, SkyMiles, and more. Get Help ›
>>> 
>>> Have a great trip, and thank you for choosing Delta.
>>> Fri, 12NOV	DEPART	ARRIVE
>>> DELTA 2734
>>> Basic (E)
>>> DALLAS-LOVE FIELD 
>>> 12:40pm	ATLANTA
>>> 3:41pm
>>> Sun, 14NOV	DEPART	ARRIVE
>>> DELTA 2229
>>> Basic (E)
>>> ATLANTA 
>>> 8:32am	DALLAS-LOVE FIELD

>   |     PRIVACY POLICY
> <https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201f77b57ccd89a4535e4c42cc756d3652fc5a51622d562dc3ba15472e78242845c3186d1c27811d88417203241f0dc534a44b11f23f7f36162ae908fc36ac1fd2c3>
>
>
>
>
> [image: Leaf icon]  Fly green. Partner with us to protect the environment
> and support communities. Visit delta.com/co2
> <https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201f395639325743a68a1c651c9ca05e57d1844da9c62b877f35f89ab5a694d9fae4a5e1f17ed1315f43ac196d8b5aa920cec3589f527de9587b>
> to learn more about offsetting your carbon footprint.
>
> *Terms & Conditions*
>
> This ticket is non-refundable unless the original ticket was issued at a
> fully refundable fare. Some fares may not allow changes. If allowed, any
> change to your itinerary may require payment of a change fee and increased
> fare. Failure to appear for any flight without notice to Delta will result
> in cancellation of your remaining reservation.
>
> Note: When using certain vouchers to purchase tickets, remaining credits
> may not be refunded. Additional charges and/or credits may apply.
>
> †All SkyMiles® program rules apply. To review the rules, see Membership
> Guide & Program Rules. Taxes and fees for Award Travel are the
> responsibility of the passenger and must be paid at the time the ticket is
> booked. Award Travel seats are limited and may not be available on all
> flights or in all markets. Offers void where prohibited by law. Other
> restrictions may apply.
>
> *Checked Bag Allowance*
>
> *On Delta® operated flights, you may carry on one bag and a small
> personal item at no charge.
>
> Delta One®/First/Business Class weight allowance reverts to 50 lbs for
> all checked bags beyond regular free allowance.
>
> At the time of check in with Delta, SkyMiles Medallion members, SkyTeam
> Elite & Elite Plus and active US Military personnel are eligible for fee
> waivers and other benefits. For more details, visit delta.com/baggage
> <https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201ff189a1c3686eb98150f57b9af47c2d7fbb8259e4ac31cf5502c88c61cc17c1fb90ae7af073c9eba333a98a76ea76b8b71a0ee01b53f099f4b3e6441b8338efba>.
> Basic Cardmembers with a Gold, Platinum, or Reserve Delta SkyMiles Credit
> Card from American Express are eligible for the first bag fee waiver. More
> details on the program can be found at delta.com/firstbagfree
> <https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201f76c337f2520bdb274afbb40034344179110116a284c7a1385d8f432ec3676fbdb78a09756a2758508e90de7003ab053f30c3ad81816f6af3f2807fb5129549a5>
>
> A standard checked bag with Delta may be up to 50 lbs and 62 linear inches
> (per piece). Additional fees apply for oversize, overweight, and/or
> additional pieces of checked baggage. Please review Delta's baggage
> guidelines for details. Weight and size restrictions may vary when checking
> baggage on carriers other than Delta. Contact with the operating carrier
> for detailed checked baggage allowances. You must be checked in at the gate
> by the applicable check-in deadlines or your reservation may be cancelled.
> Please review Delta's check-in requirement guidelines for details. Check-in
> requirements vary by airline, so if your ticket includes travel on other
> airlines, please check with the operating carrier on your ticket.
>
> Do you have comments about our service? Please email
> <https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201faed7e24680ded9103e5b7db709179669b45fa59e18e3862b59dc4599dea55f315adbc9b3653c9b520a6732dfd644fb2a2a390b168415cc71>us
> to share them.
>
> *ADVICE TO INTERNATIONAL PASSENGERS ON LIMITATIONS OF LIABILITY​*
>
> Passengers embarking upon a journey involving an ultimate destination or a
> stop in a country other than the country of departure are advised that the
> provisions of an international treaty (the Warsaw Convention, the 1999
> Montreal Convention, or other treaty), as well as a carrier’s own contract
> of carriage or tariff provisions, may be applicable to their entire
> journey, including any portion entirely within the countries of departure
> and destination. The applicable treaty governs and may limit the liability
> of carriers to passengers for death or personal injury, destruction or loss
> of, or damage to, baggage, and for delay of passengers and baggage.
>
> Additional protection can usually be obtained by purchasing insurance from
> a private company. Such insurance is not affected by any limitation of the
> carrier’s liability under an international treaty. For further information
> please consult your airline or insurance company representative.
>
> *Conditions of Carriage*
>
> Air transportation on Delta and the Delta Connection® carriers is subject
> to Delta's conditions of carriage
> <https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201fd6a76214753109f51d54f6a7bd06e169e74c2942158b800cce85e1b15c9e72b39ea146760eb25c32e4e4c1039dd6312669071362a86eafde>.
> They include terms governing for example:
>
> • Limits on our liability
> <https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201f7dc551f474d1902e75fe74cc2252beb7e3637291228304ff0440623871d81450df8bbca97979876748da28620753112fe29f6fce11fa3c5eb894dccac9788022>
> for personal injury or death of passengers, and for loss, damage of delay
> of goods and baggage.
> • Claim restrictions
> <https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201f57290fedea1dbf6f4fdf5e75e9e0e70ac3ca3686b2aa1a20deead2cf22e90ba916697e770f551a3b7d7566f089c84e873e012728592910b730881c426a3eacba>
> including time periods within which you must file a claim or bring action
> against us.
> • Our right to change terms
> <https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201ffcf518f1b4a7f23825bcd3b0121124be495f790629b053663c558d14dbce4db984ffe93dc5b72223f6d008a2f71bf1c44661b74104a9763ca41bf4ed0ded1a93>
> of the contract.
> • Check-in requirements
> <https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201f6453abd55f42946b07cc564fc11ec64edf825517c031e5b8925112c6b70b81b688eb521701a964c7bdfeab5058e61cf494040c65407e0ff72becfc6947ef8694>
> and other rules established when we may refuse carriage
> <https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201f1ff3c428e03ca4333184e82ad73ea0ae6a030a2094bc6f55a22fa5b1fd562c0813ff00214869739eb866e39cb25f078e05abecafd48c615b85013240338b37ca>
> .
> • Our rights and limits of our liability for delay or failure to perform
> service
> <https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201fa006740bcadf2e598d2ab19e6676854cb55455f0f32f81f95691ac7fb7566c38b5f5653e5e39aa2a6ed0f4400c3eef83ee9ccff58a302798f4bf57e68c58db9d>
> including schedule change, substitution of alternative air carriers or
> aircraft, and rerouting.
> • Our policy on overbooking flights
> <https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201ff9161306644b5727183d5b16dea4bb2e1a14de5937ad3326a091eab526d48013862491e7422180448164208a2bebab3cbbfa086b368e21929e910aface59b397>,
> and your rights if we deny you boarding due to an oversold flight.
>
> These terms are incorporated by reference into our contract with you. You
> may view these conditions of carriage on delta.com, or by requesting a
> copy from Delta.
>
> You have received this email because you elected to receive your
> Electronic Ticket receipt sent to you via email. If you would like to take
> advantage of other Delta email programs featuring special fares,
> promotions, information and flight updates, please visit:
> delta.com/emailprograms
> <https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201f3907dd0311a70051a65dc414b340e88997ed7233bd6a0640899f36226d2da22dcf2a003aae6ce594de6ef7fbb57a283f6aae14c35bf32f57b37b973621073e49>
> or delta.com/notifications
> <https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201fec88902376bc1c4795038cfd45fabb73e9b8609e581695969325ef2dafe6186662506b8a8ffbbeb6c618b9e0179d5fb1104e23764fbe0c836a49ac4b6bedc120>
>
> This document establishes the creation of your electronic EMD(S) in our
> computer systems. It does not constitute a document of carriage. Where this
> document is issued for transportation or services other than passenger air
> transportation, specific terms and conditions may apply. These terms and
> conditions may be provided separately or may be obtained from the issuing
> agent.
>
> Effective December 15, 2019, the Canada Air Passenger Protection
> Regulations may provide additional protections to passengers traveling to
> or from Canada:
>
>
>
> *If you are denied boarding, your flight is cancelled or delayed for at
> least two hours, or your baggage is lost or damaged, you may be entitled to
> certain standards of treatment and compensation under the Air Passenger
> Protection Regulations. For more information about your passenger rights
> please contact your air carrier (www.delta.com/appr
> <https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201f649fb8b1ffec097c5eb56e926611ba9dc0f6e62fda6b5d17e3dbe1a7f6fcf94a68415aef4b238c8feab55d343542699b0c136e51f5d444bb3a06ec615bd0aa90>)
> or visit the Canadian Transportation Agency’s website. Si l’embarquement
> vous est refusé, ou si votre vol est annulé ou retardé d’au moins deux
> heures ou si vos bagages sont perdus ou endommagés, vous pourriez avoir
> droit au titre du Règlement sur la protection des passagers aériens, à
> certains avantages au titre des normes de traitement applicables et à une
> indemnité. Pour de plus amples renseignements sur vos droits, veuillez
> communiquer avec votre transporteur aérien ( www.delta.com/appr
> <https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201f073782b624b0c1b7f866151141a332d5f0cbc28f59a83aa13247deb388e700093cf301346a3802cfeda878326bf7e39921f79c3126293eb07795ce42b136d653>)
> ou visiter le site Web de l’Office des transports du Canada.*
>
> *COPYRIGHT INFORMATION*
>
> This email message and its contents are copyrighted and are proprietary
> products of Delta Air Lines, Inc. Any unauthorized use, reproduction, or
> transfer of this message or its contents, in any medium, is strictly
> prohibited.
>
> This is a post only email (EMD+). Please do not respond to this message.
>
> *PRIVACY POLICY*
>
> Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy
> <https://click.t.delta.com/u/?qs=4d5420705605201f6753aba2677805e3c5df6b7c8de0d73c98f4f07237993688bcc78af156bf94774f7d22189b19fb721b57fb358a6019b0fb152075f1f69aa6be993d98eb903b29>

Please note the following delivery policies:

Delivery times cannot be guaranteed. Please contact the servicing store
with any questions regarding your delivery.

At the serving store's discretion, the recipient may be called to schedule
the delivery.

For residential deliveries: If the recipient is not available at the time
of delivery, we can no longer leave the delivery with a neighbor. We can
only arrange to leave a delivery at a neighbor’s upon specific request of
the guest. If you want your order to be left with a neighbor if the
recipient is not home, please make sure to advise the local store in your
delivery instructions at the time you place the order. You will need to
provide the name and address of the neighbor. **During busy holiday times,
residential deliveries may be made as late as 9:00 PM. Your local store may
contact you if you place a same day order for delivery to reschedule your
order for another day.

For business deliveries: At the location, the delivery person may leave the
gift with the front desk, security, or receptionist with specific
instructions to refrigerate immediately. Edible Arrangements® is not
responsible for any gift that is not properly handled. We advise that same
day business deliveries are placed before 3:00 PM. The servicing store may
contact you to reschedule same-day orders placed after 3:00 PM. If the
business is closed, delivery will be attempted the next business day. NOTE:
Business deliveries may happen as late as 5:00 PM.

For school deliveries: At the location, the delivery person may leave the
gift with the front desk, security, or receptionist with specific
instructions to refrigerate immediately. Edible Arrangements® is not
responsible for any gift that is not properly handled. We advise that same
day business deliveries are placed before 12:00PM to accommodate earlier
closing times for schools. The servicing store may contact you to
reschedule same-day orders placed after 12:00 PM.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Questcare MC - McKinney 2 <no-reply@eclinicalmail.com>
Date: Thu, Dec 16, 2021 at 7:32 AM
Subject: Welcome to Questcare Medical Clinic
To: <ifyahuna@gmail.com>


Questcare Medical Clinic

5291 W UNIVERSITY DR , ,
MCKINNEY, TX 75071-7093

Welcome to Questcare Medical Clinic!

Dear Ifeoma,

We are honored you have selected us as your health care provider. Our goal
is to provide the highest quality care for all of our patients in a timely
and respectful manner.

As a new patient with our practice, please complete the new patient
paperwork located on our website
<http://questcaremedicalclinic.com/patient-information/forms-documents/> for
your upcoming appointment.  Please bring the completed paperwork with you
to our office.

Please arrive approximately 20 minutes before your appointment to have time
to verify necessary paperwork.

For this first visit, please bring:

   - Completed New Patient Registration
   <http://questcaremedicalclinic.com/pdf/new-patient-registration.pdf>
   - Current Driver's License or other Government-Issued Photo ID
   - Current Insurance Card
   - Medical Records from Other Physicians
   - Current Medication List (including all prescriptions, supplements, and
   OTC medications)

If you are scheduled for a well visit or physical, please fast for a
minimum of 8 - 10 hours before you arrive.  You may have only water and
black coffee during that time.

Please be prepared to pay co-payments or deductibles at the time of your
visit.  If you are unable to provide our office current insurance
information, you will be asked to pay for the services at the time of your
appointment.  Please direct any questions you may have regarding your
benefits to your insurance company.  We accept cash, checks, Master Card,
Visa, American Express, and Discover.

Please feel free to contact our office at 972-542-8464 with any questions.
Thank you for choosing us for your health care needs!

Hope to see you soon!

Regards,

Questcare Medical Clinic,

972-542-8464

If you wish to opt out from receiving these notifications in the future,
you can Unsubscribe
<https://ucstest.eclinicalweb.com/ucs/unsubscribeNew.do?v=QW1kMmtyVXUxamhCSmFtK3R3dGJXYk5qR1pZWDlmS1RMakpTWlI2ejBJWUtyTjZRN1VxclVVMU8vTi9zVGxDRThxWHNCdFZOejl5SlowNGpvK3BOZWkzbFl5b05sRlNWWXpEdCtISG0zZ3B6eHFzU2taSktrR0UwWWtpblV0TGUwQUpvVTkrVlFGVEVwZU5KdnBkL3BBPT0=>.

subject: It's official! You're getting a Fitbit gift.
body:
A Fitbit gift has been ordered for you.

Are you smiling?
You're totally smiling.

Something special is coming your way, courtesy of Your favorite girlfriend - Efee.


---------------------------------------------------------------
Merry Christmas monks! I know I've given you a hard time this year, but all your dedication and hard work means the world to me. I love you and I hope you enjoy your new Fitbit so you never miss one of my annoying texts or calls ever again. Also so you can track the sleep you won't be getting dating me! Cannot wait for when I get back!
---------------------------------------------------------------



Your gift was ordered on December 20, 2021 and will be shipped to:

      Shawhin Talebi
    
    3813 Rolling Hills Dr
    
    
    Plano, TX 75025-2059
    United States



No need to camp out by the mailbox!


Track your package with this FedEx Home Delivery tracking number:

  529420925015




Have questions? Contact us at http://help.fitbit.com! Your confirmation number is 087batn7xd86j.

>> this email was not written by a therapist and doesn't constitute as therapy.

subject: Re: Global Entry Enrollment Interviews Offered in New Locations
body:
The one question I would have is would you be able to use TSA pre-check in global entry when departing for the trip?

Another thought is, you might be tired after arriving from an international flight and may not want to do the interview then.

When’s the next available appointment?


> On Feb 16, 2022, at 11:03 AM, Ifeoma Ahuna <ifyahuna@gmail.com> wrote:
> 
> ﻿
> you think this is better?
> 
>> On Tue, Feb 15, 2022 at 1:16 PM <donotreply@cbp.dhs.gov> wrote:
>> Dear Global Entry Applicant,
>> 
>> Instead of scheduling an appointment at a Global Entry Enrollment Center, you have the unique opportunity to interview for Global Entry when you return from your next international trip.
>> 
>> What is Enrollment on Arrival? Global Entry applicants who are conditionally-approved can complete their interviews, the last step of the Global Entry process, while they are clearing through United States Customs and Border Protection or Pre-Clearance.
>> 
>> Enrollment on Arrival (EoA) is ONLY available at participating international airports in the United States and select Pre-Clearance locations and is NOT available on domestic connections.
>> 
>> Enrollment on Arrival is now available at the following locations:
>> 
>> Austin-Bergstrom International Airport (AUS)
>> Abu Dhabi international Airport (AUH)
>> Aeropuerto Internacional Reina Beatrix in Oranjestad, Aruba (AUA)
>> Baltimore/Washington International Airport (MWI)
>> Boston Logan International Airport (BOS)
>> Buffalo Niagara International Airport (BUF)
>> Calgary International Airport (YYC)
>> Charlotte Douglas International Airport (CLT)
>> Chicago Midway Airport (MDW)
>> Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky International Airport (CVG)
>> Cleveland Hopkins International Airport (CLE)
>> Dallas Fort Worth International Airport (DFW)
>> Denver International Airport (DEN)
>> Detroit Metropolitan International Airport (DTW)
>> Dublin Airport (DUB)
>> Edmonton International Airport (YEG)
>> Fairbanks International Airport (FAI)
>> Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport (FLL)
>> Fresno Yosemite International Airport (FAT)
>> George Bush Intercontinental Airport (IAH) in Houston
>> Halifax International Airport (YHZ)
>> Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport (ATL)
>> Honolulu International Airport (HNL)
>> John F. Kennedy International Airport in New York (JFK)
>> John Glenn Columbus International Airport (CMH)
>> Kansas City International Airport (MCI)
>> Los Angeles International Airport (LAX)
>> Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport (MSY)
>> Metropolitan Oakland International Airport (OAK)
>> McCarren International Airport (LAS) in Las Vegas
>> Miami International Airport (MIA)
>> Minneapolis St. Paul International Airport (MSP)
>> Montreal-Pierre Elliot Trudeau International Airport (YUL)
>> Luis Munoz Marin International Airport San Juan (SJU)
>> Lynden Pindling Nassau International Airport (NAS)
>> Newark Liberty International Airport (EWR)
>> Norman Y. Mineta San Jose International Airport(SJC)
>> O'Hare International Airport (ORD) in Chicago
>> Ontario International Airport (ONT) in California
>> Orlando International Airport (MCO)
>> Orlando Sanford International Airport (SFB)
>> Ottawa International Airport (YOW)
>> Philadelphia International Airport (PHL)
>> Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport (PHX)
>> Portland International Airport (PDX)
>> Raleigh-Durham International Airport (RDU)
>> Reno-Tahoe International Airport (RNO)
>> Sacramento International Airport (SMF)
>> Salt Lake City International Airport (SLC)
>> San Antonio International Airport (SAT)
>> San Diego International Airport (SAN)
>> San Francisco International Airport (SFO)
>> Seattle Tacoma International Airport (SEA)
>> Shannon Airport (SNN)
>> St. George`s Bermuda International Airport (BDA)
>> St. Louis Lambert International Airport (STL)
>> Tampa International Airport (TPA)
>> Ted Stevens Anchorage International Airport (ANC)
>> Toronto Pearson International Airport (YYZ)
>> Vancouver International Airport (YVR)
>> Washington Dulles International Airport (IAD)
>> William P. Hobby Airport (HOU) in Houston
>> Winnipeg James Armstrong international Airport(YWG)
>> Check the CBP.gov website for an updated list of participating airports.
>> 
>> What do I do when I land in the international terminal? Follow the signage directing you to CBP officers who can complete your Global Entry interview during your admissibility inspection. In addition to your entry document (e.g., your passport), you will need documents providing evidence of residency. Examples are driver's license (if the address is current), mortgage statement, rental payment statement, utility bill, etc. This is not required for minors.
>> 
>> If you would like to save time and effort, then join the thousands of other conditionally-approved Global Entry applicants and participate in Enrollment on Arrival.
>> 
>> This is an automated email. Please do not reply.
>> 
>>  
>> 
> 
> 
> --

subject: Fwd: UPDATE: 6 More Weeks Until Our Wedding!
body:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: SCEdwards Wedding <sc.edwardswedding@gmail.com>
Date: Wed, Apr 20, 2022 at 12:52 AM
Subject: UPDATE: 6 More Weeks Until Our Wedding!
To: SCEdwards Wedding <sc.edwardswedding@gmail.com>


Hello Wedding Guests!

We are 6 weeks away from our Destination Wedding in Ibiza, Spain. We want
to send a few reminders to help you prepare for your upcoming trip!

*Wedding Attendance*


Please let us know by Monday, May 23rd if you are no longer planning to
attend the wedding. Please also note, we do not have additional seating or
plates for guests not on our wedding list. If your friends or family are
traveling to Ibiza with you and they were not included in our original
guestlist, they are more than welcome to enjoy Atzaro and the island during
the wedding festivities!


Travel & Packing Details

We have provided a suggested packing list for your travel HERE
<https://drive.google.com/file/d/1IDR0Fk-7fJuUY69di4FsfDIvAlPd5WVp/view?usp=sharing>.
Additionally, we want to remind you  that many answers to your questions
about Covid-19 & restrictions can be found on our FAQ page on our wedding
website
<https://www.appycouple.com/wedding/catherinesylvin/?g=1&nabr=0&preview=1&layout=single#hotels>
.

Things to Do in Ibiza

On Friday, June 3rd the Traditional Nigerian-Belizean Wedding will be
followed by the White Ceremony & Reception. On Saturday, June 4th the
festivities continue on the water with a Boat Party, where you are all
invited. If you would like to join the bride and groom, please send $100
per person to Sylvin (Venmo: @sylvinedwards; Zelle: 3233879291). This
includes drinks, food, music and some water activities.

We encourage you to explore the island during your stay. Here are some “Things
to Do”
<https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attractions-g187460-Activities-Ibiza_Balearic_Islands.html>
in Ibiza according to Tripadvisor.

Tips & Recommendations


   1.

   We recommend changing your cash in the US to Euros for the best
   conversion.
   2.

   Double check your Flight and Hotel reservation confirmations.
   3.

   Use the packing list to pack for the Trip to avoid any issues.
   4.

   Please use this link <https://www.hoppa.com/en/search-results-gm>to
   coordinate travel if necessary.



With Love,

Catherine & Sylvin



--
label: personal

Questions
When will I get my items?
The shipping estimates above tell you when your items are expected to

and tracking information.
Ordered more than one item? You’ll get a separate email as each item ships.
There are no additional shipping fees for these items.
How do I view or change my order?
Visit online Order Status
<https://store.apple.com/xc/us-edu/vieworder/W1168658651/ifyahuna@gmail.com/>
to view the most up-to-date status and make changes to your order. To learn
more about shipping, changing your order, or returns, please visit online
Help <https://store.apple.com/us/help/>.
You can also call Apple Support at 800-692-7753 Monday through Friday from
9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. and Saturday from 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. Pacific
time.
How do you get credit for your Apple Trade In?
It depends on how your purchase was made.
If you paid in full for a new Apple product:
We’ll credit your payment method up to the purchase price after your device
has been received and verified. If there’s any amount remaining, we’ll send
you an Apple Store Gift Card by email.
If you paid monthly with Apple Card Monthly Installments:
Credit for your trade-in has already been applied to your purchase. Once we
receive your device and the condition matches what you described, there’s
nothing more you need to do. If it doesn’t match, your original payment
method will be charged the difference plus any applicable taxes as a
standard transaction.
If you’re making payments on a new iPhone:
If you’re using carrier financing, the Apple iPhone Upgrade Program, or
Apple iPhone Payments, we’ll credit your payment method up to the amount of
taxes and fees for your iPhone. If there’s any remaining amount, we’ll send
you an Apple Store Gift Card by email.
How long do I have to send in my trade-in device if I am sending it back by
mail?
When your new product ships or you’ve picked it up from the Apple Store, a
trade-in kit will be shipped to you. Once you receive the kit, you’ll have
14 days to prepare and send in your device.
What happens with my trade-in if I return my new Apple product?
If you added a trade-in to this order and have not received a refund, we’ll
cancel your trade-in and send back your device.
If we’ve already credited your payment method for the value of a trade-in
you added to this order, we can only refund your payment method up to the
original purchase price amount. In that case, we’ll still owe you the value
of your trade-in. Because we can’t apply it to your original payment
method, we’ll issue it to you on an Apple Gift Card by email.
<https://www.apple.com/us/shop/accessories/all-accessories/whats-new?&cid=TRX-EN-US-DM-OM-BDY-00AOS-IOA-AMR-FG-V200-s1-mac-merchtile_whats_new>

Get the Apple Store App <https://store.apple.com/us/go/app?>

available to select at checkout for certain Apple products purchased at
Apple Store locations, apple.com, the Apple Store app, or by calling
1-800-MY-APPLE, and is subject to credit approval and credit limit. See
https://support.apple.com/kb/HT211204 for more information about eligible
products. Variable APRs for Apple Card other than ACMI range from 10.99% to
21.99% based on creditworthiness. Rates as of April 1, 2020. If you choose
the pay-in-full or one-time-payment option for an ACMI eligible purchase
instead of choosing ACMI as the payment option at checkout, that purchase

national carriers: AT&T, Sprint, Verizon, or T-Mobile.
* This amount is the estimated total of all initial Apple Card Monthly
Installments in this order, the actual monthly installment amount is shown
when you check out. Each item will be charged to your account and reflected
on your monthly statement as of the day it ships. Your first installment
payment may be less than this amount if items are not charged or shipped in
the same month. Taxes, shipping, and other additional charges are subject
to your standard purchase APR and separately billed on the shipping date,
but are not included in your installment amount. The last month’s payment
for each product will be the product's purchase price, less all other
payments at the monthly payment amount.
To access and use all the features of Apple Card, you must add Apple Card
